name: Car Transformation Horse Robot: Robot Car Games
name_original: Car Transformation Horse Robot: Robot Car Games
description:
Welcome to the futuristic robot transformation experience with Car Transformation Horse Robot: Robot Car Game. This muscle car simulator is an invasion mission to stop crime. This shooting game has different transformer battle missions with modern assault weapons. Enjoy the futuristic robot simulation fun and wild horse transformer shooter action with transforming technology. Stop the crime in the city like cop cars with modern robots battle to become a city savior.

Car Transformation Horse Robot: Robot Car Game Features:
* Realistic city environment with car transform machine robots
* Amazing robot horse transform fighting animations
* Different assault rifles, rocket launchers and modern weapons for shooting
* Robot Car physics with futuristic robots and car transformation mechanics
* Superhero robot with 3D shooting experience for action games liker

This muscle car transformer is racing simulation with shooting strategies for crime controlling. In this car driving simulation your car transform into a huge shooting robot to fight with enemy. Show your shooting skills to eliminate your invader enemy and shoot them down. You can use different sniper guns, modern assault rifles and rocket launchers in this futuristic robot shooter. This car transforming shooting robot game is an invasion of muscle car shooting robots. Follow your enemy with flying horse robot and car transformation to catch them and finish them by shooting.

In Car Transformation Horse Robot: Robot Car Game, there are 10 challenging shooting missions with realistic battlefield 3D environment. Enjoy the transforming robot battle animations of fighting transformers. Use your best flying cars and flying horse robot during car transformation battle in this car racing simulator game. 

Efficient controls of this robot simulation game make the best invasion shoot against the enemy. Be a bravest warrior and fight like superhero transformer against monster robots.
